verses.roman:
ataeva bhakta-gaṇe kari namaskāra
nihśaṅke kahiye, tāra hauk camatkāra

synonyms: ataeva—therefore; bhakta-gaṇe—unto the devotees; kari—I offer; namaskāra—obeisances; niḥśaṅke—without any doubt; kahiye—I say; tāra—of the devotees; hauk—let there be; camatkāra—astonishment.
translation: Therefore after offering obeisances to the devotees, for their satisfaction I shall speak without hesitating.
